name: DonaldTrump DAO——For the 47th U.S. President
description:
@ConstitutionDAO was the first project to try to impact the real world,But it failed.But we still believe the dao will impact the world.We're going to do something bigger with Donald Trump DAO —— To raise money for the 2024 election，Let everyone know the power of the DAO！

A.Project Details
War、Inflation、Recession,The Democrats messed everything！Now,Our eternal president——Donald J. Trump,Will announced his candidacy for President of the United States in 2024 on November 8.
We will raise money to support him in his fight to the end!We will take back our country and our values!We will make America great again!

B.Statement of Purpose of Funds:
1、50% for support campaign rallies
2、30% for advertising across the country
3、10% to form a campaign support organization
4、10% is in the fund for special situations

C.“TRUMP”
We will be airdropping “TRUMP” tokens to supporters.No funds will be retained by the DAO.All tokens will be provided to backers.

Join us now!We will make America great again!
